briefTitle: Generation of Cancer Antigen-Specific T-cells From Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells (iPSC) for Research and Potential FutureTherapy
officialTitle: Generation of Cancer Antigen-Specific T-cells From Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells (iPSC) for Research and Potential Future Therapy
conditions: Gastrointestinal Cancers, Breast Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Melanoma, Lung Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
* INCLUSION CRITERIA:
* Patients with a cancer diagnosis enrolled on protocol 03-C-0277.
* Willing and able to provide informed consent
* Patients must be greater than or equal to 15 years of age.

EXCLUSION CRITERIA:

-Healthy donors enrolled on protocol 03-C-0277.
